steps.journalDescription: I spoke with Imre and convinced him to get the nonbranded slaves in on the escape plan. For now, I should wait until the revolution begins in earnest, then go and find him.
I spoke with Imre and intimidated him into joining our conspiracy. It'll be up to him to convince the other nonbranded slaves to help us. I can only hope he doesn't screw it up.
The time has come to put our plan into action. Imre will be waiting for me somewhere near the Manse; I need to link up with him and discuss our next move.
Imre has told me that the guards are holding the other nonbranded slaves in the kitchens, but he has unbarred the kitchen's servants entrance. I should enter the kitchens and liberate the nonbranded.

I have entered the kitchens and killed Kende, the cook. Now I have a way inside the Manse that avoids the guards' barricades. I should speak to Imre now that he is free to speak to see if he has any more aid to offer.
Imre has betrayed me to the guards. I was forced to slay the nonbranded alongside their captors.
I never helped free Imre from his captors. I wonder what happened to them...
